meanings.definition: The layer of tissue located beneath the mucous membrane.
meanings.sent1: The submucosas provide support to the mucous membrane.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the submucosas to understand tissue structure.
meanings.sent3: The submucosas decided to throw a surprise party for the mucous membrane.
meanings.sent4: The submucosas are like the strong foundation of a building, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the submucosas look like a dense network of fibers.

meanings.definition: The submucosa layer of the digestive tract.
meanings.sent1: Food passes through the submucosas in the digestive tract.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the importance of the submucosas in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The submucosas in the digestive tract threw a party for the food passing through.
meanings.sent4: The submucosas are the hidden gems of the digestive system, crucial for absorption.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the submucosas as a protective blanket for the digestive tract.
